    • Constructor Detail

      • MidiWars

        public MidiWars​()
         throws IOException,
                MyExceptions.MidiPathNotFoundException,
                ParserConfigurationException,
                SAXException
        Creates a new MidiWars object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If couldn't extract configs from resources.
        MyExceptions.MidiPathNotFoundException - If default path listed in the configurations file is invalid.
        ParserConfigurationException - If there was a configuration error within the parser.
        SAXException - If couldn't parse configurations file.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play​(String filename)
          throws AWTException,
                 InterruptedException,
                 InvalidMidiDataException,
                 IOException,
                 MyExceptions.MidifilesNotFoundException,
                 ParserConfigurationException,
                 SAXException
        Plays the given midi file or playlist.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of midi file / playlist to play.
        Throws:
        AWTException - If the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control.
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.
        InvalidMidiDataException - If midi file is invalid.
        IOException - If can't open file.
        MyExceptions.MidifilesNotFoundException - If couldn't find the midi files listed in the playlist.
        ParserConfigurationException - If there was a configuration error within the parser.
        SAXException - If couldn't parse playlist file.

      • pause

        public void pause​()
           throws InterruptedException
        Pauses playback.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.

      • resume

        public void resume​()
            throws AWTException,
                   InterruptedException,
                   InvalidMidiDataException,
                   IOException
        Resumes playback.
        Throws:
        AWTException - If the platform configuration does not allow low-level input control.
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.
        InvalidMidiDataException - If midi file is invalid.
        IOException - If can't open file.

      • stop

        public void stop​()
          throws InterruptedException
        Stops playback.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If a thread was interrupted.

      • canPlay

        public ArrayList<Instrument.Warning> canPlay​(String filepath)
                                      throws InvalidMidiDataException,
                                             IOException
        Checks if the given midi file can be played by the given instrument.
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path of midi file to play.
        Returns:
        List of warnings.
        Throws:
        InvalidMidiDataException - If midi file is invalid.
        IOException - If can't open file.
        See Also:
        Instrument.Warning
